emailText.start:
Hello (names)!
Please RSVP for the upcoming Couples tournament here! If the link does not work, please copy and paste the following link into your browser: (url)
emailText.remind: (names), it appears you haven't submitted your RSVP for the upcoming Couples tournament. Please do that here! If the link does not work, please copy and paste the following link into your browser: (url)
emailText.cutoff:
Dear (names),
If you are receiving this email, you have registered to play in the Couples playday on (day)!
Plan to arrive no later than (arrive)
Call the golf shop at 512.930.5698 to change your RSVP. Thanks!
